title: i'm reaching out blindly for help
body: someone hacked me an i'm desperate to get my account back

replies.body: Hey there, I've locked the account as a safety precaution to prevent anymore unauthorized access.  Fill out an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and our account team can help get your info updated and the account back into your hands.  See you there!
